languages.text: {n}На губах гемункула играет садистическая улыбка.{/n} "Хорошо. Интересно, какой психологический эффект окажет весть о твоем решении на... оставшиеся образцы".
{n}A sadistic smile is playing on the Haemonculus's lips.{/n} "Yes... I wonder what effect this will have on the rest of the specimens once they learn of your decision."
languages.original_text: {n}На губах гемункула играет садистическая улыбка.{/n} "Хорошо. Интересно, какой психологический эффект окажет весть о твоем решении на... оставшиеся образцы".

{n}A sadistic smile is playing on the Haemonculus's lips.{/n} "Yes... I wonder what effect this will have on the rest of the specimens once they learn of your decision."

languages.text: {n}ハモンキュラスの唇に嗜虐的な笑みが浮かぶ。{/n}「そうだ…お前の決断を知ったら、他の標本たちにどのような影響があるだろうな」
languages.original_text: {n}A sadistic smile is playing on the Haemonculus's lips.{/n} "Yes... I wonder what effect this will have on the rest of the specimens once they learn of your decision."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハモンキュラスの唇に嗜虐的な笑みが浮かぶ。{/n}「そうだ…お前の決断を知ったら、他の標本たちにどのような影響があるだろうな」

languages.text: {n}血伶人唇边露出了施虐的微笑。{/n}“很好……我想知道，等到其他的实验对象知道了你的决定之后，他们会作何反应。”
languages.original_text: {n}A sadistic smile is playing on the Haemonculus's lips.{/n} "Yes... I wonder what effect this will have on the rest of the specimens once they learn of your decision."

traits.locale_text: {n}血伶人唇边露出了施虐的微笑。{/n}“很好……我想知道，等到其他的实验对象知道了你的决定之后，他们会作何反应。”

languages.text: {n}Un sourire sadique se dessine sur les lèvres de l'hémoncule.{/n} « Oui... Je me demande quel effet votre décision aura sur les autres spécimens lorsqu'ils en seront informés. »
languages.original_text: {n}A sadistic smile is playing on the Haemonculus's lips.{/n} "Yes... I wonder what effect this will have on the rest of the specimens once they learn of your decision."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un sourire sadique se dessine sur les lèvres de l'hémoncule.{/n} « Oui... Je me demande quel effet votre décision aura sur les autres spécimens lorsqu'ils en seront informés. »

languages.text: {n}Una sonrisa sádica recorre los labios del Hemónculo.{/n} «Sí... me pregunto qué efecto tendrá esto sobre los otros especímenes una vez descubran tu decisión».
languages.original_text: {n}A sadistic smile is playing on the Haemonculus's lips.{/n} "Yes... I wonder what effect this will have on the rest of the specimens once they learn of your decision."

traits.locale_text: {n}Una sonrisa sádica recorre los labios del Hemónculo.{/n} «Sí... me pregunto qué efecto tendrá esto sobre los otros especímenes una vez descubran tu decisión».

languages.text: {n}Ein sadistisches Lächeln umspielt die Lippen des Haemonculus.{/n} "Ja ... Ich frage mich, welchen Effekt das alles auf die übrigen Versuchsstücke haben wird, wenn sie von Eurer Entscheidung erfahren."
languages.original_text: {n}A sadistic smile is playing on the Haemonculus's lips.{/n} "Yes... I wonder what effect this will have on the rest of the specimens once they learn of your decision."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein sadistisches Lächeln umspielt die Lippen des Haemonculus.{/n} "Ja ... Ich frage mich, welchen Effekt das alles auf die übrigen Versuchsstücke haben wird, wenn sie von Eurer Entscheidung erfahren."

languages.text: {n}Haimonkulus'un dudaklarına sadistçe bir gülüş yerleşiyor.{/n} "Evet. Kararını öğrendiklerinde diğer numuneler nasıl tepki verecek merak ediyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}A sadistic smile is playing on the Haemonculus's lips.{/n} "Yes... I wonder what effect this will have on the rest of the specimens once they learn of your decision."
